title: Pixel 2 Lagging Suddenly
content: I woke up to my pixel 2 lagging really hard. I have never had any problems before today. I followed the troubleshooting tips. Restarted. Checked for Updates. Cleared Space. Restarted. Hard Reset. Restarted. Safe Mode. Restart. It is almost unusable. I don't know what would have set it off. It was fine when I went to bed last night, but this morning it was laggy.
